mapper.select: SELECT E.EXCHANGE_NO, E.STATUS, E.OIL, E.CASH, E.APPROVAL_DATE, E.APPLICATION_DATE, E.MEMBER_NO, E.CANCEL_REASON, E.ACCOUNT_HOLDER, E.APPLICATION_BANK, E.APPLICATION_ACCOUNT_NUMBER, M.MEMBER_TYPE, M.MEMBER_ID FROM EXCHANGE E INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.MEMBER_NO = E.MEMBER_NO) ORDER BY EXCHANGE_NO DESC

SELECT E.EXCHANGE_NO, E.STATUS, E.OIL, E.CASH, E.APPROVAL_DATE, E.APPLICATION_DATE, E.MEMBER_NO, E.CANCEL_REASON, E.ACCOUNT_HOLDER, E.APPLICATION_BANK, E.APPLICATION_ACCOUNT_NUMBER, M.MEMBER_TYPE, M.MEMBER_ID FROM EXCHANGE E INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.MEMBER_NO = E.MEMBER_NO) WHERE EXCHANGE_NO = #{exchangeNo}

SELECT E.EXCHANGE_NO, E.STATUS, E.OIL, E.CASH, E.APPROVAL_DATE, E.APPLICATION_DATE, E.MEMBER_NO, E.CANCEL_REASON, E.ACCOUNT_HOLDER, E.APPLICATION_BANK, E.APPLICATION_ACCOUNT_NUMBER, M.MEMBER_TYPE, M.MEMBER_ID FROM EXCHANGE E INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.MEMBER_NO = E.MEMBER_NO) WHERE EXCHANGE_NO = #{exchangeNo}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EXCHANGE E INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.MEMBER_NO = E.MEMBER_NO)
AND (E.STATUS = '환전진행중' OR E.STATUS = '환불진행중' OR E.STATUS = '승인' OR E.STATUS = '반송')
AND E.STATUS = '환전진행중'
AND E.STATUS = '환불진행중'
AND E.STATUS = '승인'
AND E.STATUS = '반송'
AND (M.MEMBER_TYPE = 'B' OR M.MEMBER_TYPE = 'U' )
AND M.MEMBER_TYPE = 'B'
AND M.MEMBER_TYPE = 'U'
AND M.MEMBER_ID LIKE '%'||#{memberId}||'%'
AND (TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(E.APPLICATION_DATE,'rrrr/mm/dd'), 'yyyy/mm/dd') >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{today},'yyyy/mm/dd'), 'yyyy/mm/dd') AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(E.APPLICATION_DATE,'rrrr/mm/dd'), 'yyyy/mm/dd') <= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SYSDATE,'rrrr/mm/dd'), 'yyyy/mm/dd'))
AND (TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(E.APPLICATION_DATE,'rrrr-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(E.APPLICATION_DATE,'rrrr-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') <= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd'))

AND (TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(E.APPLICATION_DATE,'rrrr-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(E.APPLICATION_DATE,'rrrr-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') <= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd'))
